quote: You wake up unemployed every single day in our business.
why_clipworthy: This statement challenges agents to maintain a proactive mindset.
suggested_hook: Why waking up unemployed might be the best motivation for real estate agents.

quote: Treat every client as if they are your only client.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of personalized client care.
suggested_hook: The secret to client loyalty? Treat them like they're your only one.
